Sentencas: Doped barium cerate is a promising solid electrolyte for intermediate temperature fuel cells as a protonic conductor.
Titulo: Performance of spray deposited Gd-doped barium cerate thin films for proton conducting SOFCs

Sentencas: In the present paper, the nanocrystalline Gd-doped barium cerate (BaCe0.7Gd0.1Y0.2O2.9) thin films have been successfully deposited on alumina substrate by spray pyrolysis technique.
Titulo: Performance of spray deposited Gd-doped barium cerate thin films for proton conducting SOFCs

Sentencas: The films deposited from 0.1 M concentration and annealed at five different temperatures were characterized with different physio-chemical techniques.
Titulo: Performance of spray deposited Gd-doped barium cerate thin films for proton conducting SOFCs

Sentencas: The BCGY is crystallized in orthorhombic perovsldte structure with slight shift to the lower 2 theta value compared with barium cerate (BC) and yttrium doped barium cerate (BCY).
Titulo: Performance of spray deposited Gd-doped barium cerate thin films for proton conducting SOFCs

Sentencas: The grain growth and hence densification is also investigated by using SEM and AFM.
Titulo: Performance of spray deposited Gd-doped barium cerate thin films for proton conducting SOFCs

Sentencas: The grain growth is almost complete at 1000 degrees C and the surface of the film appears to be smooth with typical roughness of 152 nm.
Titulo: Performance of spray deposited Gd-doped barium cerate thin films for proton conducting SOFCs

Sentencas: Raman spectrum of BCGY film shows intense band at 463.8 cm(-1) compared to pure BC and BCY indicating the presence of more oxygen vacancies due to Gd doping.
Titulo: Performance of spray deposited Gd-doped barium cerate thin films for proton conducting SOFCs

Sentencas: The proton conductivity of BCGY thin film in moist atmosphere is 1 x 10(-3) Scm(-1).
Titulo: Performance of spray deposited Gd-doped barium cerate thin films for proton conducting SOFCs
Performance of spray deposited Gd-doped barium cerate thin films for proton conducting SOFCs
